courseDetails.courseTitle: AI-Enhanced Digital Marketing + Graphic Designing + Video Editing Mastery
courseDetails.category: Digital Marketing + Graphic Design + Video Editing
courseDetails.desc: Master AI-enhanced digital marketing, graphic design, and video editing techniques in this 3-month program. Create impactful marketing campaigns, eye-catching visuals, and professional videos for a strong portfolio.

courseOverview.title: What you'll learn
courseOverview.desc: The AI-Enhanced Digital Marketing + Graphic Designing + Video Editing Mastery course is a game-changing program designed for individuals who want to master the digital skills needed to excel in the modern marketing landscape. This integrated course combines digital marketing strategies, graphic design techniques, and video editing expertise, all powered by AI tools. Whether you’re looking to run SEO campaigns, create stunning visuals, or edit high-quality videos, this course provides you with a complete set of skills that will help you succeed in the digital world. By the end of the course, you will be capable of executing full-fledged marketing campaigns that include stunning visuals and videos.

courseOverview.title: What you'll learn
courseOverview.desc: The Creative Media Mastery program combines video editing and graphic designing into a comprehensive 12-week course.
